roleset.name: to exercise sovereign power, dominate

example.name: transitive
example.text: President Carlos Salinas de Gortari used the army to oust La Quina , who reigned for 28 years over a graft - riddled empire that made state - run Petroleos Mexicanos , or Pemex , one of the world 's most inefficient oil companies .

propbank.arg: over a graft - riddled empire that made state - run Petroleos Mexicanos , or Pemex , one of the world 's most inefficient oil companies

roleset.note: REIGN-V NOTES: Frames file for 'reign' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from reign.01-v predicate notes)
